enumeratedValues.name: standard
enumeratedValues.description: Standard features implemented.

enumeratedValues.name: state_logic_parallel
enumeratedValues.description: Supports state, logic and parallel modes.

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO module is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO module is enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Software reset is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: Software reset is enabled, all FlexIO registers except the Control Register are reset.

enumeratedValues.name: normal
enumeratedValues.description: Configures for normal register accesses to FlexIO

enumeratedValues.name: fast
enumeratedValues.description: Configures for fast register accesses to FlexIO

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO is disabled in debug modes.

enumeratedValues.name: emable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO is enabled in debug modes

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO enabled in Doze modes.

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO disabled in Doze modes.

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: receive
enumeratedValues.description: Receive mode. Captures the current Shifter content into the SHIFTBUF on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValues.name: transmit
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit mode. Load SHIFTBUF contents into the Shifter on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValues.name: matchstore
enumeratedValues.description: Match Store mode. Shifter data is compared to SHIFTBUF content on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValues.name: matchcont
enumeratedValues.description: Match Continuous mode. Shifter data is continuously compared to SHIFTBUF contents.

enumeratedValues.name: state
enumeratedValues.description: State mode. SHIFTBUF contents are used for storing programmable state attributes.

enumeratedValues.name: logic
enumeratedValues.description: Logic mode. SHIFTBUF contents are used for implementing programmable logic look up table.

enumeratedValues.name: active_high
enumeratedValues.description: Pin is active high

enumeratedValues.name: active_low
enumeratedValues.description: Pin is active low

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Shifter pin output disabled

enumeratedValues.name: opend_bidirouten
enumeratedValues.description: Shifter pin open drain or bidirectional output enable

enumeratedValues.name: bidir_outdata
enumeratedValues.description: Shifter pin bidirectional output data

enumeratedValues.name: output
enumeratedValues.description: Shifter pin output

enumeratedValues.name: posedge
enumeratedValues.description: Shift on posedge of Shift clock

enumeratedValues.name: negedge
enumeratedValues.description: Shift on negedge of Shift clock

enumeratedValues.name: value00
enumeratedValues.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on enable

enumeratedValues.name: value01
enumeratedValues.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on first shift

enumeratedValues.name: value10
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 0 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 0

enumeratedValues.name: value11
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 1 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 1

enumeratedValues.name: value00
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store

enumeratedValues.name: value01
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, receiver/match store will store receive data on the configured shift edge when timer in stop condition

enumeratedValues.name: value10
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 0 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 0, receiver/match store will also store receive data on the configured shift edge when timer in stop condition

enumeratedValues.name: value11
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 1 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 1, receiver/match store will also store receive data on the configured shift edge when timer in stop condition

enumeratedValues.name: pin
enumeratedValues.description: Pin

enumeratedValues.name: shifter_nplus1
enumeratedValues.description: Shifter N+1 Output

registers.name: SHIFTBUFBIS[%s]
registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Swapped Register

registers.name: SHIFTBUFBYS[%s]
registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Byte Swapped Register

registers.name: SHIFTBUFBBS[%s]
registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Byte Swapped Register

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Timer Disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: dual8bit_baud
enumeratedValues.description: Dual 8-bit counters baud mode.

enumeratedValues.name: dual8bit_pwm_h
enumeratedValues.description: Dual 8-bit counters PWM high mode.

enumeratedValues.name: single16bit
enumeratedValues.description: Single 16-bit counter mode.

enumeratedValues.name: active_high
enumeratedValues.description: Pin is active high

enumeratedValues.name: active_low
enumeratedValues.description: Pin is active low

enumeratedValues.name: outdisable
enumeratedValues.description: Timer pin output disabled

enumeratedValues.name: opend_bidirouten
enumeratedValues.description: Timer pin open drain or bidirectional output enable

enumeratedValues.name: bidir_outdata
enumeratedValues.description: Timer pin bidirectional output data

enumeratedValues.name: output
enumeratedValues.description: Timer pin output

enumeratedValues.name: ext_trig
enumeratedValues.description: External trigger selected

enumeratedValues.name: internal_trig
enumeratedValues.description: Internal trigger selected

enumeratedValues.name: active_high
enumeratedValues.description: Trigger active high

enumeratedValues.name: active_low
enumeratedValues.description: Trigger active low

enumeratedValues.name: disable
enumeratedValues.description: Start bit disabled

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: Start bit enabled

enumeratedValues.name: stop_disable
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit disabled

enumeratedValues.name: enable_tmrcmp
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare

enumeratedValues.name: enable_tmrdisable
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer disable

enumeratedValues.name: enable_tmr_cmp_dis
enumeratedValues.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare and timer disable

enumeratedValues.name: enable
enumeratedValues.description: Timer always enabled

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_nminus1_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Timer N-1 enable

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_trighi_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Trigger high

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_trig_pin_hi_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Trigger high and Pin high

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_pinrise_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Pin rising edge

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_pinrise_trighi_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Pin rising edge and Trigger high

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_trigrise_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Trigger rising edge

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_trigedge_en
enumeratedValues.description: Timer enabled on Trigger rising or falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: never
enumeratedValues.description: Timer never disabled

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_nminus1
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Timer N-1 disable

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_cmp
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Timer compare (upper 8-bits match and decrement)

enumeratedValues.name: tmr_cmp_triglow
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Timer compare (upper 8-bits match and decrement) and Trigger Low

enumeratedValues.name: pin_edge
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Pin rising or falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: pin_edge_trighi
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Pin rising or falling edge provided Trigger is high

enumeratedValues.name: trig_falledge
enumeratedValues.description: Timer disabled on Trigger falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: never
enumeratedValues.description: Timer never reset

enumeratedValues.name: pin_eq_tmr_out
enumeratedValues.description: Timer reset on Timer Pin equal to Timer Output

enumeratedValues.name: trig_eq_tmr_out
enumeratedValues.description: Timer reset on Timer Trigger equal to Timer Output

enumeratedValues.name: pin_rise_edge
enumeratedValues.description: Timer reset on Timer Pin rising edge

enumeratedValues.name: trig_rise_edge
enumeratedValues.description: Timer reset on Trigger rising edge

enumeratedValues.name: trig_edge
enumeratedValues.description: Timer reset on Trigger rising or falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: flexio_clk_shiftclk_tmr_out
enumeratedValues.description: Decrement counter on FlexIO clock, Shift clock equals Timer output.

enumeratedValues.name: trig_edge_shiftclk_tmr_out
enumeratedValues.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Timer output.

enumeratedValues.name: pin_edge_shiftclk_tmr_out
enumeratedValues.description: Decrement counter on Pin input (both edges), Shift clock equals Pin input.

enumeratedValues.name: trig_edge_shiftclk_trig_in
enumeratedValues.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Trigger input.

enumeratedValues.name: one
enumeratedValues.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

enumeratedValues.name: zero
enumeratedValues.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

enumeratedValues.name: one_tmrreset
enumeratedValues.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and on timer reset

enumeratedValues.name: zero_tmrreset
enumeratedValues.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and on timer reset

registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Nibble Byte Swapped Register

registers.name: SHIFTBUFHWS[%s]
registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Half Word Swapped Register

registers.description: Shifter Buffer N Nibble Swapped Register
